title: Dems use Venezuela to hammer affordability issues at home
description: The party is showing a rare moment of unity following the Trump administration’s capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro.
content: The party is showing a rare moment of unity following the Trump administration’s capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro.
